cinnamon.engine.system

Class InputEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.system.Event
      • cinnamon.engine.system.InputEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyEvent, MouseEvent

    public abstract class InputEvent
extends Event

    Describes the InputEvent.Action input that forms a common basis for a KeyEvent and MouseEvent by describing each InputEvent with an Action such as InputEvent.Action.PRESS or InputEvent.Action.RELEASE.

    Only MouseEvents whose MouseEvent.Button is MouseEvent.Button.MIDDLE may have InputEvent.Action.SCROLL_FORWARD or InputEvent.Action.SCROLL_BACKWARD as an Action.

    InputEvent.Action.REPEAT events are copies of an older PRESS event. These are generated so long as the original PRESS has no matching RELEASE.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InputEvent.Action
      Constants describing an InputEvent's nature: either a press, release, repeat, scroll forward, or scroll backward.

        public final InputEvent.Action getAction()

        Gets the InputEvent.Action describing the InputEvent.

      • isPress

        public final boolean isPress()

        Checks whether or not the InputEvent is described by InputEvent.Action.PRESS.

        Returns:
        true if PRESS event.

        Checks whether or not the InputEvent is described by InputEvent.Action.RELEASE.

        Returns:
